kit.leader_skill: "Successors" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%; or AGL, INT & PHY Types Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +30%

super_attack.name: Explosive Wave
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Plans for the Future
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200% up; When facing 2 or more enemies: (Forever) ATK & DEF 120% up; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up; "Space-Traveling Warriors" or "Gifted Warriors" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up for 2 turns; When facing 3 or more enemies: (Forever) ATK & DEF 130% up; (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 30% up; "Space-Traveling Warriors" or "Gifted Warriors" Category allies' ATK & DEF 30% up for 3 turns; When there is another ally whose name includes "Vegeta" (Jr., Baby and Duplicate excluded) attacking in the same turn: DEF 200% up and chance of evading enemy's attack 20% up when receiving an attack; When there are no other allies whose names include "Vegeta" (Jr., Baby and Duplicate excluded) attacking in the same turn: ATK 200% up and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up when attacking; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 200% up; Launches 2 additional attacks, each of which has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack
